name: Notion Template: Take Coding Notes
description: Released on June 26, 2020Learn to code, easily organize your notes, and quickly find info when needed thanks to Notion databases, different blocks, and extensive search function.Here you can find a database with various programming languages I am currently studying and the actual notes I am taking along the way. I will keep the database updated over time and I will keep you posted every time I will complete a course on a specific language.üôè Don't forget to rate the product! It really helps a lot
